version_description: We've updated our showtimes and ticketing feature. With IMDb Ticketing, powered by Atom Tickets, customers in the U.S. and Canada can conveniently purchase movie tickets. Also, we've fixed some iPad bugs and made some additional performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements, including a fix for the iMessage App not loading. Thanks for using IMDb!

Would you like to be the first to use new versions of the IMDb app? Send an email to iphone@imdb.com and ask to be a beta tester.
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've updated the app for iOS 11, fixed some bugs, and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

This update fixes an issue with viewing notifications in the app.

We've updated the app for iOS 11, fixed some bugs, and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
Thanks for using IMDb! We've fixed some bugs, including a few accessibility issues.
Updated for the iPhone X! Thanks for using IMDb.

Now you can dive deep into Movies, TV, and Celebs, explore the latest Awards & Events, and find your Watchlist from the top of the homepage. We've updated the user review experience, making it easier to find all the reviews and commentary in one place. We've also fixed several iPad bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated user reviews so you can now sort by most helpful, review date, and review rating. You can choose to exclude reviews with spoilers. We've also made a number of performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated Lists with the ability to add or edit notes to any movie, show, or person. On any list item, just tap the menu and then "Add Note" or "Edit Note" to get started. We've also updated news. Now you have access to our entire history of news, not just the last 100 articles. Finally, we've fixed a couple of bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated Lists with the ability to add or edit notes to any movie, show, or person. On any list item, just tap the menu and then "Add Note" or "Edit Note" to get started. We've also updated news. Now you have access to our entire history of news, not just the last 100 articles. Finally, we've fixed a couple of bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We now remember the last page you viewed before leaving the app. When you re-open IMDb, we'll return you to that page (within 90 minutes). We've also fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!

v8.6.1
Bug fixes

v8.6
We now remember the last page you viewed before leaving the app. When you re-open IMDb, we'll return you to that page (within 90 minutes). We've also fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We’ve made a number of updates in our newest release:
• We’ve brought back the option to mark Recommendations as Not Interested!
• The user reviews page for movies and TV loads faster and has more sort options.
• We fixed a bug impacting buying tickets for future movie releases.
• And we’ve made loading title and name pages faster!

We’ve made a number of updates in our newest release:
• We’ve brought back the option to mark Recommendations as Not Interested!
• The user reviews page for movies and TV loads faster and has more sort options.
• We fixed a bug impacting buying tickets for future movie releases.
• And we’ve made loading title and name pages faster!
• In 8.10.1, we fixed the notification settings page toggle switches.
This version contains a fix for a crashing bug

We've added the ability to see all the reviews from a single user. Find a reviewer you like from any title page, tap the three dots, and check out what other movies or shows they liked! You can also sort and filter their - and your - reviews. We also added a fix for a crash impacting users on iOS 10.3.3, and improved the video experience on iPhone X.

We've made getting recommendations for movies and shows easier - try it out by tapping the side navigation and then Rate and Get Recommendations! We've also made filtering on lists easier with one-tap buttons along the top row. Thanks for using IMDb!
We’ve added easier filtering to most of our lists. We’ve also updated our video player, making videos load faster and play more smoothly. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new Watchlist tab, with pre-filtered sections of your Watchlist and lists of recommended titles to find great shows and movies to watch. We now support iOS 12 - including Siri Shortcuts for your Watchlist, ratings, Showtimes, and more! We fixed a couple bugs (on Trivia and Connections pages) and updated linking in photo galleries and quotes pages. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new Watchlist tab, with pre-filtered sections of your Watchlist and lists of recommended titles to find great shows and movies to watch. We now support iOS 12 - including Siri Shortcuts for your Watchlist, ratings, Showtimes, and more! We fixed a couple bugs (on Trivia and Connections pages) and updated linking in photo galleries and quotes pages. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated our Trivia, Quotes, Goofs, and Crazy Credits pages on movies and shows to allow you to sort, filter, and vote on each item more easily. We've also fixed some bugs in lists throughout the app. Thanks for using IMDb!
Mostly under-the-hood changes in this release to improve speed and reliability. Thanks for being an IMDb customer!

We gave our people and title pages a little facelift - check it out, and let us know what you think! We also added Latest Trailers and News to the Watchlist tab, and added a Recommendations experience to help you find great shows and movies to watch. Thanks for using IMDb!

We gave our people and title pages a little facelift - check it out, and let us know what you think! We also added Latest Trailers and News to the Watchlist tab, and added a Recommendations experience to help you find great shows and movies to watch. Thanks for using IMDb!

In v9.3.1, we fixed an issue where the app wasn't always opening on iOS 10 and 11.
This release contains some minor improvements and bug fixes. Thanks for using IMDb!
This release contains a fix that was causing some users to experience login failures. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new 'Find Movies and TV Shows' tab after tapping the search bar - you can select filters like genre, year, and IMDb rating to get a list of titles that match your criteria. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated the design of the Parents' Guide! You can now see color-coded ratings by category, add your vote on the severity of each item, and contribute new items to the guide. On people pages, we now show you movies and shows that person appears in that you've rated. We also added previous Find Titles & TV Shows searches to the Recent Searches page. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated the design of the Parents' Guide! You can now see color-coded ratings by category, add your vote on the severity of each item, and contribute new items to the guide. On people pages, we now show you movies and shows that person appears in that you've rated. We also added previous Find Titles & TV Shows searches to the Recent Searches page. Thanks for using IMDb!
You can now tap genres, languages, and countries on movie and show pages to see lists of popular related titles! And, as always, bug fixes.

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some small improvements to the TV Episodes experience - but most of the changes in this update are under the hood. Bug fixes and performance updates throughout the app. Thanks for using IMDb!
...Bueller? Bueller? It might seem like you can't find any updates in this version - and you'd be right! Mostly bug fixes. Thanks for using IMDb!

Did you know Matt LeBlanc only had $11 to his name when he auditioned for Friends? And can you quote Chandler's "most interesting" line? We made it easier to see ALL of the cool movie/show info with fast tabbing between sections. We also made some slick improvements to our one-tap filters on lists - we hope you like them!

Did you know Matt LeBlanc only had $11 to his name when he auditioned for Friends? And can you quote Chandler's "most interesting" line? We made it easier to see ALL of the cool movie/show info with fast tabbing between sections. We also made some slick improvements to our one-tap filters on lists - we hope you like them!

"Never show anyone. They'll beg you and they'll flatter you for the secret, but as soon as you give it up... you'll be nothing to them." Christian Bale was right in The Prestige - you won't see the changes in this update, and we're not telling! (Bug fixes and under-the-hood changes). Thanks for using IMDb!

"Never show anyone. They'll beg you and they'll flatter you for the secret, but as soon as you give it up... you'll be nothing to them." Christian Bale was right in The Prestige - you won't see the changes in this update, and we're not telling! (Bug fixes and under-the-hood changes). Thanks for using IMDb!

(In 9.12.1, we also fixed a crash)

We're in the midst of some longer-term projects right now, so you won't see too many changes in the app this time around. We made some small updates to a number of pages to make them load faster, and fixed a few bugs. Stay tuned - thanks for using IMDb!

We're in the midst of some longer-term projects right now, so you won't see too many changes in the app this time around. We made some small updates to a number of pages to make them load faster, and fixed a few bugs. Stay tuned - thanks for using IMDb!

Welcome to IMDb TV! You can now watch full-length movies and TV shows in the app (currently limited to US customers). Tap on the new homepage tab to browse recommendations, or search the whole catalogue through Find Movies and TV Shows. You can also filter lists to show what's available to stream today.

We've updated our User Activity page (the little icon in the top right of the screen) to make it easier to access your Watchlist, Ratings, Recent History and more. Check it out! Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated our User Activity page (the little icon in the top right of the screen) to make it easier to access your Watchlist, Ratings, Recent History and more. Check it out! Thanks for using IMDb!

In 9.15.1, we fixed an issue where some people didn't receive notifications.
We've updated our movies and shows pages to show you when you can watch on IMDb TV, Amazon Prime Video Channels, HBO, Starz, Showtime, and PBS! Thanks for using IMDb!

We've moved our navigation to the bottom of the app! You can now access Home, Search, IMDb TV (in the US), Video (outside of the US) and You pages from anywhere in the app. Double-tap the search icon to initiate a search, and log in or register to start building your Ratings and Watchlist. Thanks for using IMDb!

Wondering what to watch? Trust IMDb. We’ve created an all-new experience to help you. You’ll find Fan Favorites and Streaming Picks to help you make choices on where and when to watch films and TV every day. We also fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!
We fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!
We fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!

This release includes additional filtering for Watch Options including filtering by in theaters, streaming subscriptions, streaming rent/buy, on TV, on disc, or coming soon. We also fixed a number of bugs."

Here's what new in this release:
• iOS Dark Mode support! Change Settings > Theme to "System Default" and the app will always use the system-wide appearance setting (iOS 13 only)
• Search History now shows the results you most recently visited
• We've added Top Box Office to the homepage

Thank you for using IMDb!

Here's what new in this release:
• iOS Dark Mode support! Change Settings > Theme to "System Default" and the app will always use the system-wide appearance setting (iOS 13 only)
• Search History now shows the results you most recently visited
• We've added Top Box Office to the homepage

In 10.1.1, we've fixed the cursor to be visible on contribution pages.
You might notice some changes around here. We've updated (most of) the app's text and page styling, as well as improved our list experiences. Hope you enjoy - thanks for using IMDb!
You might notice some changes around here. We've updated (most of) the app's text and page styling, as well as improved our list experiences. Hope you enjoy - thanks for using IMDb!

“That rug really tied the room together.” You’ll notice that we did a little remodel on movies and shows pages to help you easily discover what to watch next. You can also now simultaneously rate and remove titles in your Watchlist. Behind the scenes, we fixed several bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Hope you enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

"12345? That’s amazing, I’ve got the same combination on my luggage!” Mel Brooks kept it simple, and you can too with the addition of Sign In with Apple to sign in and manage your IMDb account. We also fixed bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Hope you enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

Forrest Gump reminded us memories have limits when he said, “I don’t remember being born…but I do remember the first time I heard the sweetest voice in the wide world.” With IMDb TV’s progress bar and “continue watching” section, he and you can now resume free movies and TV shows without remembering where you left off. We also fixed bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

Forrest Gump reminded us memories have limits when he said, “I don’t remember being born…but I do remember the first time I heard the sweetest voice in the wide world.” With IMDb TV’s progress bar and “continue watching” section, he and you can now resume free movies and TV shows without remembering where you left off. We also fixed bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

Like Keanu Reeves in Speed, we have to keep our app moving fast… which is why we’ve improved our loading speed on title and people pages! Hope it feels snappy. We’ve also added recommendations from your Watchlist to the homepage – get inspired this weekend (or register and create a Watchlist if you haven’t already). Thanks for using IMDb!

This release includes several under-the-hood updates, so you may not notice too many changes this go around. We updated a number of pages, fixed bugs, and improved overall performance. Stay tuned for what’s next, and thanks for using IMDb!

“There may be something there that wasn’t there before.” Like Belle's newfound emotions for the Beast, we think you’ll fall for what's new in this release. The refreshed Improve Top Picks page (click "Improve top picks" on the home tab) lets you rate and watchlist popular movies and shows to improve personalized recommendations. We updated the Parents' Guide section and added a "runtime" filter to refine lists when time matters. We also fixed bugs to enhance performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

“No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.” Like Robin Williams inspiring students in Dead Poets Society to contribute a verse to life's powerful play, we empower you to contribute to IMDb. The “contribute to this page” feature on movie and people pages enables you to edit and improve IMDb to benefit everyone. We also fixed bugs to enhance performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!
